title: FS: Large Lot of Low/Mid-Grade T206 w/ Many HOF'ers & SL'ers **ALL CARDS SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Low/Mid-Grade T206 w/ Many HOF'ers & SL'ers **ALL CARDS SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale. These are all low to mid-grade cards, ranging from poor to VG/EX, as the scans will show.

*NOTE* My scanner does not work well with graded cards, so if you would like better pics of any of the graded ones, I can send those to you separately.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

ALL CARDS HAVE BEEN SOLD.  Thanks for looking!
Email sent. I'll take chase pink
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
I'll take Duffy (Sweet Cap);
PM sent.
Ben
Any more price drops on these? I’d be interested in Birmingham, Brashear, Congalton and Slagle. Also, maybe McGraw and Powell if the price is right. Thanks!
Cards received - thanks for the deal Marc
Bump for a final price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
